message: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Western Technology Music Society - WTMS, IIT KGP's photo. For all you musicians out there; Here's your chance to be a part of Western Technology Music Society - WTMS, IIT KGP! Be there on 22nd (Instruments) and 23rd (Vocals) of August at V4 from 6.30 PM onwards. \m/
story: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Western Technology Music Society - WTMS, IIT KGP's photo.

message: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur's photo. Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur brings you IBM technology challenge! This challenge is divided into 3 phases :- Online Quiz Challenge - There are 30 MCQs to be solved in 60 minutes. Hack Camp - Hack Camp will be set-up, where mentors from IBM will impart knowledge on IBM technologies and train students for the next stage. Hackathon - This is the final stage where students will be developing applications based on IBM technologies. Register now at www.venturesity.com/ibm Hack Camp Venue : 27th August | Vikramshila | 10 AM
story: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur's photo.

message: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Cultural, IIT Kharagpur's photo. Poetry submission for FRESHERS. You can submit only one poem in either Hindi or English. The word limit is 100-200 words. Submit your poem at tsg.socult@gmail.com. Mention your name and roll number in the email with the file attached.The deadline for submission is 23rd august(Tuesday) midnight, after that no submission will be accepted. For any doubts contact Dhruv Mahajan - 8890166175
story: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Cultural, IIT Kharagpur's photo.

message: Nimb is a ring with a panic button that allows you to send an emergency alert to preset contacts from the mobile app with just the touch of a thumb.
Nimb is a ring with a panic button that allows you to send an emergency alert to preset contacts from the mobile app with just the touch of a thumb.

Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared M N Faruqui Innovations Centre's photo. Aakruti is a 3D Designing contest for Engineering and Design students.This contest is a unique opportunity for the students to demonstrate their creative abilities and bring their imagination to life. The highlights of this year's competition are: >> Employment opportunity for top two teams* at 3DPLM. >> Free license of SOLIDWORKS full version to use at home for participating in contest >> Prizes worth ₹ 2 Lakhs. >> Trophy for college submitting maximum qualified entries. >> Opportunity to create a product which can help in building up and grow the nation. Find more at http://www.3dplmsoftware.com/aakruti/ (* team should be of final year students)
story: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared M N Faruqui Innovations Centre's photo.

“Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there”
Table Tennis is like an atom. To the ignorant it is merely microscopic and insignificant in existence, but to the dedicated, it is intricate in design.
Come, and play each point like your life depends on it .
TABLE TENNIS OPEN IIT TOURNAMENT 
Registration deadline 18th August.
Date : 20th August.
Venue : table tennis room (old gymkhana)
Contact your hall G SEC. Sports for registration.
Reporting on 20th August, 9am sharp at OLD GYMKHANA.
For any queries, please contact 
SOMESH POONIA
Secretary INDOOR GAMES.
CONTACT NUMBER-9547489747

Sports do not build your character ,they reveal it .
Life is like tennis,No matter how many times you try,if you keep on doing the same mistakes and you don't practice to get it right ,You will never get better.
Come, and play each point like your life depends on it .
LAWN TENNIS OPEN IIT TOURNAMENT
Date : 20th August.
Venue : TSG Tennis Court.
Contact your hall G SEC. Sports for registration.
Reporting on 20th August, 9am sharp at TSG Tennis Court.

Every Pro was once an amateur, Every expert was once a beginner. So dream big and start now. 
Basketball.. Well Its 's not just a sport, It's a lifestyle. Come and showcase your skills in the basketball freshers tournament. If you are not able to form teams, just come as an individual we'll make the teams for you.
Date: 19th August
Venue: Basketball Court
Registrations on the Spot
